sources.title: 1969 - God Will Forgive My Pistol - Texas Ranger Gone Rogue! Italian Western film
sources.description:
Texas Ranger Johnny Brennan (Wayde Preston) rides into town to investigate shady dealings, facing off against wheelchair-bound cattle kingpin Charlie Clanton (Giuseppe De Santis)

Original title: Dio perdoni la mia pistola
Alternative titles: God Will Forgive My Gun

Cinematography: Stelvio Massi  
Music: Vasili Kojucharov

üåü MAIN CAST 
Wayde Preston - Johnny "Texas" Brennan
Loredana Nusciak - Gladys Clanton
Giuseppe 'Joe' De Santis - Charlie Clanton 
Dan Vadis - Deputy Jason Martin
Jos√© Torres - Jerome Prescott
Livio Lorenzon - Ramon Ramirez
Giuseppe Addobbati - Sheriff Brennan

Genres: Spaghetti Western ‚Ä¢ Drama ‚Ä¢ Action
Release date: August 7, 1969
Filming location: Italy

Did you know? Loredana Nusciak shared the screen with Clint Eastwood in 'The Good, the Bad and the Ugly'

metadata.Plot: A Texas Ranger investigates the death of a landowner.
metadata.Actors: Wayde Preston, Loredana Nusciak, Jos√© Torres
